name: STB Nightly Reboot End Time
description: Defines latest time of automatic reboot during night.

name: STB Nightly Reboot
description: Defines whether an STB in Standby mode is automatically rebooted during night.

name: Zenterio SAT
description: Datafield for Zenterio client to store device specific information like the satellite configuration, diseqc and unicable paramaters.

name: STB Nightly Reboot Start Time
description: Defines earliest time of automatic reboot during night.

name: InterstitialPageOnOff
description: Device setting to enable/disable the display of the interstitial page

name: StartPageOnOff
description: Device setting to enable/disable the display of the start page
Settings configured  via sat setup wizard
name: STBSatSettings

description: Stores status of grant of the subscriber per app concerning the data privacy.
name: 3DPartyAllow

description: Enables data privacy page per app, including data for info page.
name: 3DPartyDataPrivacy
